name: BCMControls
0:
”Alexa ask b. c. m. how's my building”
”Alexa get equipment status from b. c. m.”
”Alexa get building status from b. c. m.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: b. c. m.
des:
Use Alexa to ask questions about your equipment. Get status updates anytime with the voice-activated Alexa. 

To start the skill, say "Alexa, start BCM".

You can say "building status" for a summary of your equipment.

At anytime, you an stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
